texts.name: Shiva
texts.biography: Shiva is the youngest of six daughters in a family of circus animal trainers.  Unhappy with the prospect of spending her entire life in the family business, she left the circus to join the Krewlod military as a mercenary, a business that she has excelled at.

specialty.description: Increases the Attack and Defense skills of any Rocs or Thunderbirds for each level attained after 5th level.
specialty.name: Rocs
